original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1146)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(986)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，同時對體力低於 <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> 的目標造成 <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> 額外傷害，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4695)@</color> 秒內對敵方造成傷害的 <color=#ccffcc>35%</color> 轉變為自身體力。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1146)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(986)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicting physical damage to the enemy in the front range, and at the same time inflicting physical damage to targets whose physical strength is less than <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> Extra damage, and within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4695)@</color> <color=#ccffcc>35%</color> that causes damage to the enemy within seconds is transformed into physical strength.
